summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1420, for the improvement of Main Street, form the east margin of Twentieth Avenue South to a connection with the existing sewer on the east margin of Twenty-first Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary catch basins, manholes and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 15497 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
